import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

for s in S:
    print(chr(ord(s) + N) if ord(s) + N <= ord('Z') else chr(ord(s) + N - ord('Z') + ord('A') - 1), end='')

# ord() : character to integer, chr() : integer to character
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
s = sys.stdin.readline()

for i in range(len(s)):
    if ord(s[i]) + n > ord('Z'):
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n - 26), end="")
    else:
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n), end="")
import os

import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()

if N < 26:
    for s in S:
        print(chr(ord(s) + N) if ord(s) + N <= ord('Z') else chr(ord(s) + N - ord('Z') + ord('A') - 1), end='')
else:
    for s in S:
        print(chr(ord(s) + N % 26) if ord(s) + N % 26 <= ord('Z') else chr(ord(s) + N % 26 - ord('Z') + ord('A') - 1), end='')

# ord() : character to integer
# chr() : integer to character

# ord() : character to integer
# chr() : integer to character

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
s = sys.stdin.readline()

for i in range(len(s)):
    if ord(s[i]) + n > ord('Z'):
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n - 26), end="")
    else:
        print(chr(ord(s[i]) + n), end="")
